website_summaries.verdict: Choose this affordable drone if you are looking for the perfect combination of value and features that will make kids want to master drone flying.
pros: Although it's affordable and fairly basic, this mini drone earns praise for its numerous features that make it easy for novices to take off, adjust speeds and directions, and land
It's  easy to control in flight, and it can do some tricks
cons: Some serious drops and bumps can damage it
however, it can handle most typical flying conditions

website_summaries.verdict: One of the best mini drones for beginning adults and kids wanting a durable flyer for crashes and stunts.
pros: Drone comes with a number of handy features to assist new pilots including altitude hold mode, simple speed adjustments and a headless mode that allows the drone to change directions without changing its heading
cons: The drone is more fragile against common knocks and scrapes than other options

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a fun toy for my boyfriend and our dog
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a fun toy for my boyfriend and our dog. Blu likes to chase birds outside and figured this would be great for indoors. Well... he LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: An absolute blast! For the money, you can't go wrong. So. Much. Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I picked up the little green one because it was cheaper than the others (whats so bad about green, people?) - its great! It's had a few bumps here and there and keeps on working like a champ! The blade protectors provide excellent protection and this is great for indoors and out (although it's a bit sensitive to gusts of wind due to it's size.) It's quick and zippy at high speed outside, and inside its just right. This is a great gift for someone from kids to adults! LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Evilfiend

customer_reviews.title: Good little starter drone for the not so rough kid.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. The kids played with it and it seemed to perform as expected. They had fun and at the end of the night it left with the birthday boy. He is a rough kid so I can only imagine once he got home he destroyed it ;-) no fault of the product. From my day of observation all were happy and it worked as expected. Seemed easy for them. One of the boys did knock it out of the air with a pillow. I powered off and on and once again she flew like a bird!
customer_reviews.author: BobbyD

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it when it worked.....
customer_reviews.text: I wish we could have gave this a 5-star rating this really is a fun little drone for beginners my ten-year-old son can control it perfectly in our small living room it launches and lands nicely the reason I'm giving it one star rating is the first one we bought would go up but would not come back down this one my son has played with it less than a dozen times and one of the motor stopped working :( might be looking into returning product and the next few days don't know if green is just a bad color?
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: On the plus side it's cheap and easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side it's cheap and easy to fly. But it kept drifting despite all attempts to trim. Unfortunately after the battery drained, it wouldn't charge. I tried multiple USB sources, hence it could be the cable or the unit (or the battery)...
customer_reviews.author: Invisigoth

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to fly right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fly for a five year old. And adults. I got three diferente mini drones this Xmas And this one stood out for its ease of flight and nice instructions (trust me, these were written in English as opposed to Chinese to English which are incomprehensible!) totally worth the price. It’s also fallen a bunch of times and seems more substantial than other mini ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalba

customer_reviews.title: Best one I have bought!
customer_reviews.text: My 6y old has wanted a drone for his birthday and after buying several (which broke within a day or two), we decided to give this little guy a try. To my surprise, this little drone has smooth and easy controls, flies great, and has so far lasted beyond a week while in use by a 9,6, and 3 year old. This little drone has been a delight to my boys and I have enjoyed watching them play with it as well. I’m hoping it lasts a long time because it has been, by far, the best drone I have purchased for them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival and very cheaply made for a kid, I know it's cheap but I'm glad I took it out of the box to test it before I gave it to my nephew for Christmas because I have to get him another toy, I may send it back but really not with my time, it's really cool looking and the drone lights up but the remote vibrated then died on first start with brand new batteries, and I can tell you right now after a few times unplugging the rechargeable battery on the drone it will break and that's it, just poorly designed
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good drone
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year-old left a bad review & weird comment ("I like trains") without my knowledge. With the help of their father, they purchased this drone using my account. It was delivered and the kids played well with it. After a while, the oldest kid mentioned that one side turn is a little weird but it's nothing major. Actually, I think it's a pretty good drone for the beginners/younger kids because it has a button to land smoothly. My other kids have more sophisticated drones that you have more to control and it can change parts, but I think this Potensic Mini Drone is more fun to fly.
customer_reviews.author: jsychk

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough for a 5 year old to fly!
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old wanted a drone like his older siblings, but I knew he wouldn't be able to fly theirs due to how complicated they are. After much research, I took a chance on this little drone and couldn't be happier. It is so responsive that my 5-year-old has no problem flying it. It cannot due flips and doesn't have a camera like my older kids' drones, but for just a small, responsive drone, it has been great. It flies for about 15 minutes once charged and came with 2 batteries. I would like to purchase an additional battery and charger to give a little more flight time, but other than that, it's a great little drone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Betts

customer_reviews.title: Top-Notch Drone for Inside Flying
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is the PERFECT drone for beginners. Between the altitude hold (hovers by itself) and three speed levels, this thing is a breeze to fly. Flip it into high speed mode and it'll zip around the room like you wouldn't believe. I've also smashed it into plenty of walls and it still flies true. I bought two of these and had a blast teaching my father how to fly in my living room. A lot of fun to fly, you'll definitely get your money out of this little guy
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Flew away on first use, but customer service is good
customer_reviews.text: Like some other people have stated, there seems to be something off with the autoleveling or remote, as the first time my son and I took it outside to try it out, it got to only about 10 feet off the ground and stopped responding, floating off into the sky. Very disappointed purchaser and sad kiddo :( (it was a birthday gift). UPDATE: Their customer service team sent a free replacement after seeing this review. My son loves it and flies it all the time now (indoors!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green is bad, red is great!
customer_reviews.text: We've bought two of these green drones at separate runners, the second to replace the first one that was bad. The second green one was bad too. Neither of them hover or fly straight. However, we bought a single red one and it is excellent, with perfect handling.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Ciolino

customer_reviews.title: Great little drone!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son loves this drone and is able to fly it easily! I initially gave this a poor review but that was due to my not seeing the charging indicator light on the USB plug itself (I was expecting it to be on the drone and had the USB plug upside down and didn't notice it at first) I'm updating this review to reflect my comments (deleting the previous comments). The size is small and its super lightweight making it great for a first/learner drone. I recommend this drone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Uncontrollable.
customer_reviews.text: Returned two of these. Its uncontrollable. I have a nice DJI Spark drone and I love flying it. Im pretty good at it too. But this little thing is just not controllable. It cant avoid hitting the walls and the ceiling without any input at all. Getting it to go where you want is impossible. All your effort is spent trying to keep it from hitting the drapes Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Stable, excellent drone for the money, great service
customer_reviews.text: I have now owned three of these. The first flew perfectly and was even quite easily controlled by my 4.5 year old son. He flew that one a bit too high and the wind carried it off. We replaced that one and it was faulty out of the box - unable to hold altitude and even after calibration continuing to ascend rather than maintaining a hover. I emailed potensic with my Amazon order number and they immediately sent me a replacement without asking for any further information or even for me to return the old one. It arrived in 2 days. Great drone, especially for the price, and low risk since the customer service is so excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amir H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it went crazy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this awhile ago for my young kids to use with my husband. My 6 year old could kind of use this by himself even though it is recommended for older ages. My husband was flying it and the drone just kept going up even though he was trying to bring it down. He thinks the battery was low and maybe that’s why it went haywire. Either way, we’ve had it awhile but honestly forgot we had it so it’s been used less than 10 times and now it’s just totally gone because we couldn’t find it. Total bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Durborow

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner, but I’ve always wanted to get into drones. i got this just to start practicing. Something I would care if it got smashed to pieces. Anyways, loads of fun. It’s totally safe to play with indoors as it’s crashed into my tv, framed pictures, glass bottles on shelves and lamps and just bounced off, causing no damage to itself or my property. My cats seems to have a lot of fun jumping up and batting it down and didn’t cause any harm to them. Highly recommend to beginners. It’s kinda hard to control at first because I play Xbox a lot but you get the hang of it pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hollingshead

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I could never trim the toy. And it worked for a couple days, then died.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one day of use!
customer_reviews.text: Drone itself is great however charger connector (on the drone) broke off and fell inside the drone shell. Wasn’t rough with it at all. I cannot charge it now so it’s unusable :( very disappointed little man in my house right now.
customer_reviews.author: popolka

customer_reviews.title: This drone is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: We are over the moon with this drone. It is a very quiet, savvy little machine. It moves like no other drone I've seen in its class. We gave this to our 8 year old for his birthday and it is a WINNER!!! Thank you to this amazing customer service. We had an odd issue with the first one. I expressed concern and they were on it in a short amount of time. WOW! How did we get so lucky to have that kind of service. They stand behind their product. Yes, get it. It is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: The Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Decent Toy, Has Controller Sync Issues, Fragile Battery Connector, Limited Control
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drone to Fly in my Apartment Pros: 1. Comes with Secondary Battery 2.Seems Durable and Has Replacement Fins 3. Simple control scheme with three Modes to Control the Movement Speed 4. Liftoff Button is a nice touch Cons: 1. Battery Connector Is easily broken, I imagine anyone under 10 Would break it within 5-10 Charges 2. Syncing the Controller and the Drone Is a Nightmare 3. Taking Off only uses the Takeoff Button and Decent is slow Edit 4: After a few charges of use the Blades make angodly high pitched sound that is rather irritating
customer_reviews.author: Kalib

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners, and fathers wanting to have fun with their kids!
customer_reviews.text: These little drones are LOTS of fun, both inside and out! The good: -They are very easy to control -the multiple speed settings make letting my 6 year old use them stress free -headless mode was a neat feature -the guards around the little propellers are GREAT for preventing big accidents with both curtains AND people -lights make it easy to tell front and back Bad: -don't let it get out of range it just keeps going in that direction. Easy though, they've got a pretty decent range -controls stick a little, and are sometimes slow to respond. The controls stokc a
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for the money.
customer_reviews.text: So much fun and a great value. Not sure how long it will last but over all great documentation a lot of fun. It has three speeds so you can practice at a slower speed. The upgraded model has a camera and a replaceable battery, look at that option as well.
customer_reviews.author: SJD

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift to my Grandson for his 8th Birthday!  Win!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my Grandson who just turned 8 years old for his birthday. It was an immediate HIT, He loved it and was able to fly it pretty well within a few hours of charging it up. I also purchased one for my 30 year old son so he could fly with his son. These things were a blast to fly indoors. I love the fact that if they get out of control and hit a wall or other object and turn 90 degrees vertical or upside down, the motors immediately power off to prevent any damage to the drone or other objects. Great WIN !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tenderfoot56

customer_reviews.title: A 9 year old's perspective (and Dad's)
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2. So here is everyone's opinion: 9 year old: It's easy to fly. It's really fun. 11 year old: (would give it 4 stars) It runs out of battery quickly and the other battery doesn't charge fast enough. Dad: Blade protectors help extend blade life which is a great plus. If the drone runs into something while flying, it can bounce off the object instead of crashing to the ground like other drones we've owned. The controller is what you'd expect for this price range. It comes with an extra battery. It takes about twice as long to charge the battery as the time you get to fly it continuously.
customer_reviews.author: Lidpie

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Edit: The seller has reached out to me and helped me get back up and flying again. Adding some stars back for the great customer service. This drone, when it was working, was quite a fantastic flyer. The controls were responsive, the controller was comfortable, and the drone was agile. However, after a month of light use, one of the propellers simply stopped spinning. I tried to fix it, but couldn't figure out what was wrong. Sure, it bumped a few walls while I flew it, which may have contributed to the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Dear

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Read the instructions!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 7 years-old and he was flying this very well within just a few minutes. I’d say it took him a maximum of 5 minutes to have this drone under control. We had trouble getting it to work at first, but it was totally user error. It was Christmas morning, we were eager to get going with it, and didn’t read the instructions about pairing the remote with the drone. That takes all of 3 seconds, so it’s not even complicated. We just didn’t read the instructions to know to do it. This is quiet, small, and so far, it’s just lightly bounced off of things in the house. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: embe_3

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to fly! Perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this drone. My 3.5 year old loves drones and has been wanting to get one like this to fly on his own. I’ve been so hesitant because I didn’t want it to be a huge disappointment if it was too hard for him. But we got this drone yesterday, and he was able to start flying it on his own right away. The battery life is great compared to others we have tried and it’s so nice to have a spare. Overall, highly recommend this drone to anyone who is looking for one for their child.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: Pull left stick down to pair the remote to the drone.
customer_reviews.text: This product was opened on my sons birthday yesterday. It was slow to sinc with control. Today it doesn’t sync at all. Total flight time before failure 5 minutes at most. This is junk. Update after 20 minutes of turning off and on it finally synced. I don’t expect it to last very long as the problem keeps getting worse by the hour. I later figured out that you have to pull the left stick down I pair it with the remote. The pairing instructions should be in the first half of the manual. Instead it’s buried in the back. After figuring this out eventually without the manual my son really started enjoying this toy. It’s made well.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Mini drone that’s fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Mini drone that’s fun for the whole family. My seven-year-old is obsessed with airplanes drones and all the above. I need this mini drone will be a hit. He just had a birthday a couple of weeks ago and this is all he talked about. You open up at the birthday party and all his friends and him played with it the whole two hours. Easy to navigate. Long battery life. Great for beginners or people of all ages. Easy to learn. Even my three-year-old was able to use remote control and navigate this. Even my husband will be outside they’re playing with the drone with the kids for hours. Excellent value. Good quality. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Love my deals

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old ordered this drone with his birthday money. I was worried it wouldn't work well because it's so cheap, but its actually pretty great. The battery doesn't last a super long time, but they sent two. So one can charge while the other is being used. The batteries charge very quickly and is always fully charged by the time the other one dies. It was easy for him to learn to use too. My 8 year old and 4 year old boys are now both begging for one.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great toy drone, good for families/kids, low battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute mini drone, highly recommend for beginners and gift for kids. The only problem that I have with this drone is the battery life. They supply 2 small batteries that are usb rechargeable, but each battery will last for maybe 15-20 minutes tops before the drone starts beeping to change the battery. To have continuous play, you'd have to be constantly charging one battery while the other is being used. Other than that, I would say it's a fun mini drone to fly around.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Got to have it again buying 2 more as soon as possible
customer_reviews.text: My son fly's drones big fast ones he races them pro my 84 year old father wanted one big ones are to fast , my son put the goggles on him, he came unglued, we didn't think he could do it, we looked at the children's drones bam bought one of yours he got it in seconds he loves it !!!!! My mom just had to try it , thank goodness we got one with covers around the props, she flew it great good baby good baby oh 😘 in her hair ! Thank you drone people I picked the right one covers are the way to go !!!!!!!! Love it !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great little beginner drone for kids! My 6 year old can fly it and it seems to be strong enough that it has survived several crashes into walls and ceilings. The battery is swapable, which is great to continue flying (the older version didn't have this), but the connectors are TINY and somewhat difficult to plug in and out. Also, I have found that the joysticks drift a bit on these so they move around without any input at times. Despite that, this was a good beginner drone for my kids to fly indoors and we actually bought 6 more to give as birthday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: slowlemur

customer_reviews.title: Burned Son When Propeller Dislodged
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this drone. Within 24 hours, it had broken when one of the propellers became dislodged. The metal was hot and burned my son's index finger and thumb when he picked it up. It was a small injury, but definitely not what we had hoped for - especially after all the great reviews. Amazon refunded us.
customer_reviews.author: John McDermid

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Works right out of the box. A single button allows it to take flight and hover, then the sticks do the rest. Very easy to learn and fly. Very precise control (works well even in a small room) with ability to navigate doorways and thin hallways or other obstacles. Keeping the second battery on the charger during flight time means less down time between charges. Very impressed with this little drone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Drone BUT
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing, however the issue is with having to sync the drone with the remote every single time you go to use it. Sometimes it syncs, other times it refuses to. This issue causes us only to be able to use it maybe half the time. Very disappointing. Otherwise, if we could use it more, it would be the perfect starter drone for anyone. It's stable, does not break easy and easy to control indoors and out.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A wintertime fun fun drone!
customer_reviews.text: Background: I have a DJI Mavic Zoom and a Mavic Air. A Skyviper S1750. A Potensic F183DH and now a Potensic Firefly A20. The Potensic A20 is more than advertised! (Both Potensics are). Build obstacles out of your Amazon shipment boxes. Stay warm and run the course during halftime. Folks, this little drone is great! Durable. Controllable. Quiet. Indoor friendly. Easy. Quick battery charging. Good looking. Potensic did it again!
customer_reviews.author: Vantage Point Videos

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Drone for it's price
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this little guy so far. The features on this is better than other drones under $50.0 0 and performs great for new owners of drones. The one button take off and landing is very nice and it hovers very well. For the small size battery it uses, I was impressed with the flight time. It's a great toy for all ages. I'm looking at getting some bigger drones in the future, and seeing the quality of this one, I'm confident in the Potensic brand and will be buying theirs. The Potensic D80 is next on my list.
customer_reviews.author: iucrew

customer_reviews.title: Fun, When It Works
customer_reviews.text: It worked for one flight, and then something happened, don't know what, so it either wouldn't turn on, or turned on very briefly and then shut off. The connector to charge the battery is difficult to insert and perhaps it happened there or in some other area. They need a better way of charging as it requires one to disconnect the battery to connect it to the charger. The wires are very small and the connector very difficult to insert and disconnect creating strain on these wires.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Nee

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a "santa" gift for my 16 year old son. It broke two days after opening it and only inside careful play. We had to return it which they did make it easy and refunded us the full amount. We used that money to buy a better quality one and have no issues with that one. He is a very responsible soft spoken guy so he didn't horseplay or anything with it. It just stopped lifting period.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations, it simply works right out of the box. Turn on drone, turn on remote, left stick down until drone blinks to connect, right stick down and out to calibrate, hit the launch button and go. It is easily effected by ceiling fans or outdoor breezes etc. but in still air is incredibly easy to control. Amazed by the technology for the price! You need AAA batteries for the remote, the drone has 2 rechargeable batteries and a simple charger included. Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Steve McNutt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if other reviews were paid or what, but this was nothing like expected. Its very cheap plastic and quality. Similar to something purchased at 5 Below. My son and I played with it a total of 10 minutes before it completely stopped working. I changed the batteries and charged it, and it still lights up but there seems to be no connection between the controller and drone. Unfortunately I bought this well in advance for my sons bday and the return window ended yesterday. Spend you money elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: kmcr1823

customer_reviews.title: Most small drones have a crappy headless mode but this one works very well
customer_reviews.text: One feature to point out, it can detect a 'crash' and shuts off the propellers. If it gets stuck against the wall, runs into something that tangles the blades, it shuts down to protect itself. The motors have soft rubber pads on the bottom to absorb shock from landing. Most small drones have a crappy headless mode but this one works very well. Recharge time is about 30 minutes, flight time is about 10. Altitude hold works very well, even when you do a lot of banking and turns, it stays pretty steady. My only complaint is that it's a little slower (even in fastest speed) than other drones I've had.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Love these drones for kids. Small enought to fly in the house and easy to use. The fact that they will hold position make them easy to learn. Only issue is with the battery hook up. Pretty hard to get the battery in and plugged in. We have a. Older model that does not have the replaceable battery and while there are tradeoffs, the non replaceable battery works better for the kids. I even have a hard time getting it plugged in due to the size.
customer_reviews.author: James Winn

customer_reviews.title: Order one NOW.  I'll wait while you do it.  :-)
customer_reviews.text: Whoo-HOO! Inexpensive, but just ALL KINDS of fun. :-) Easy to fly, even for an old man with poor reflexes. Can't go wrong! UPDATE: 5 weeks later. This thing is still just a hoot to play with. I've bought a bigger drone since then but this one is still great fun inside the house. I don't know how it compares to other tiny toy drones but this thing is more fun than a basket of puppies. :-)
customer_reviews.author: J Ken Kuzenski

customer_reviews.title: Fun little drone for beginners with a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my almost-six year old, as he's been begging for a real drone. He has advanced past the "FP My First Flyer" stage. I found the controls easy enough to learn after 5 minutes or so. The take-off and landing buttons worked quite well, as I've had other cheap flyers that didn't hover nearly as well. It took a couple crashes into the wall+floor without breaking anything, but I appreciate that they included some extra propellers just in case. So far, so good. I'll update my review with a long-term review once the kids have gotten more flight time in.
customer_reviews.author: Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old grandson loves this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift in January 2019 for my 3 year old grandson. His father, my son, has a large drone, so I thought my grandson would like his own. He really likes it and is learning to manipulate the controls with some adult help. He loves to fly this all over the house. The battery lasts for about 10 minutes- which is long enough for a little kid...and his parents!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys this drone and was able to learn to fly it well surprisingly quickly. The batteries do not last too long, but two are provided and they do not take too long to charge. After he used it for a couple of months, the transmitter stopped working. However, when I emailed the manufacturer they sent us a whole new drone and transmitter to replace it, with no fuss whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: luda

customer_reviews.title: Has it’s own mind?
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is great for a kid new to drones, however...I’m wondering if it has a mind of its own. It will randomly fly hard straight away. This resulted once it hitting a neighbors house down the street (small and plastic so no harm done) and on the last flew over an overgrown vacant lot, never to be seen again. 🤬 The first of the two times was with myself (adult) at the controls and I can verify that it wouldn’t respond to what I was doing at all. Bought a 2nd and if it does the same, plan to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Super cool, until I lost it
customer_reviews.text: This little drone came as described. It was a cute little thing. It was buzzing around the yard, I was learning to navigate it, and it went flying off into Parts Unknown. It was a whole lot of fun for the 20 minutes I actually had possession of it. Now he's out there all by himself. Maybe this winter we will find him. Definitely recommend it. I would order the red so if you lost it, he would be much easier to find.
customer_reviews.author: tinakatz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner drone for someone to learn the ropes. My girlfriend and brother stuggled with my other drones so I bought this so they can learn better. Now my girlfriend can fly FPV drones thanks to this cute little guy. Very good battery life and speed selection.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Lynn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Small and fun, but let parents try it first
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let your kid try it without a parent giving it a shot first! Figure it out, demonstrate it a few times, and then give lots of warnings...because it will fly away if you’re not careful. Ours returned to our neighbor’s roof shortly thereafter, but others may not be so lucky. Works well inside, since it’s so small, as long as your house isn’t loaded with statues.
customer_reviews.author: yellowduck

customer_reviews.title: Super fun to fly!
customer_reviews.text: This quadcopter is great because the little circle guards make the propellers much safer and less prone to bending. The battery only lasts perhaps 5-10 minutes on a full charge depending on how fast you are flying it and how long it is airborne. My biggest negative on this product is that the emergency button has a 1-second timer, which seems like idiocy because in emergencies you'll want to shut it down as fast as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Devon V

customer_reviews.title: Super stable and easy to fly, learn how to trim for perfection
customer_reviews.text: This little drone is surprisingly strong for its size and sits rock solid in the air using the altitude hold feature. As with any small drone, it might drift a little in a certain direction. You can use the trim features found in the manual to correct any drifting which will get the little drone hovering nearly perfectly still. It's also super durable and great for indoor flying, even around obstacles. Overall a very fun toy for the price and great for learning how to fly.
customer_reviews.author: Archetype

customer_reviews.title: Automated Features Make it Easy to Control for Young Children
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriends 12 year old son for Christmas. Easy to fly, like the trim features too. Impressed, I know how to fly RC helicopters and airplanes, this mini drone is cool, wish they had these when I was 12 years old. A lot of technology for 30-40 dollars. Its small too with shrouded fans, REAL important, so you can fly it in a small bedroom without fear of it damaging the props. Her son loves it, maybe is cutting down the video games a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lew Mostowy

customer_reviews.title: Durable beginner drone
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo son asked for a drone for his birthday and this was a perfect entry level bird. Easy to fly and can take a few bangs and bumps as he navigates it into the walls. Battery gives you 7-10min of flight time before you have to swap it out. With its small size, it’s great for indoor slight. Recommend for beginners or anyone looking for a fun and inexpensive toy to fly around.
customer_reviews.author: walterman

customer_reviews.title: This is so awesome and definitely worth getting!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves this and my boyfriend does too and so easy to control. This is so much better then those control helicopters! It’s so easy to fly around the room and if your child some how ends up pairing control of it and it falls, it’s dosnt break as easy as those control helicopters, I love the fact it comes with more replacements, we haven’t had to use them yet because this is durable. Best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Fun little drone that seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made little drone. My 7 year old son learned how to fly this very quickly indoors. Outdoor flying for him was another story. Due to its small size it is affected by wind but it’s a great little drone. I really liked the controller and it seemed very well made compared to other cheap drones. If you are looking for a well made drone, that’s cheap and fun, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Best flying toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Potensic Firefly A20.It is awesome for beginners.It’s small sized so it can go in tight spaces and perfectly cute.The controls on the remote control(transmitter) includes auto take off and landing button(also emergency landing button),high, medium,and low level button, on off switch, and 2 control levers.All these controls make this a perfect gift for beginners(like me)and advanced flyers. It also takes a crash really well because of it’s bouncy and squishy guards.
customer_reviews.author: Shobana

customer_reviews.title: Great to see if you want to pursue this hobby.
customer_reviews.text: Pairing with remote not completely intuitive, but it works, and the control is responsive enough to learn on. Battery life is short - this is just how these things work - they use a lot of electricity and the batteries have to be light. I was pleasantly surprised at how well it self launches and hovers. I only fly mine inside, wind would likely be difficult. It is quite small and light.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 7 year old boy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 7 year old, and he loves it! He’s good with games and other remote control vehicles, but I was still impressed by how quickly he was able to master it. It’s even smaller than I was expecting, but I actually really like it because he can even fly it around inside without me worrying about breaking anything. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: jen_309

customer_reviews.title: Never paired.
customer_reviews.text: **Update** Potensic has reached out to me to replace the defective drone/controller. I appreciate them looking to make my experience a 5 star experience and look forward to flying the new drone. Like a previous review, this drone would never pair. It made a grinding noise inside the remote like a gear was spinning. Back it goes...don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Blmoon

customer_reviews.title: Great starter drone.
customer_reviews.text: What a great little drone! Bought for my 10 year old to learn and this drone has good features for that. The auto takeoff and altitude hold work great and keep her from tearing it up. It has 3 modes/speeds, beginner-advanced. The advanced mode is a pretty fast setting and makes it fun for an experienced drone pilot. Wish it had a camera but I guess you can’t have everything in a starter!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Thus is an update to an earlier review where I only gave one star for the product. After reading my review of how quickly the two drones broke, Lily, the customer service rep, reached out to me and offered to replace the broken drones with an upgraded model, free of charge. It was sent immediately to my grandson. He was absolutely thrilled. The drone is much sturdier and after several weeks of frequent use it is still intact and functioning perfectly. I truly appreciate the company’s willingness to make things right. So, five stars for the product and ten stars for the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cousin and he loves it. The drone and the remote controller are as big as a computer mouse, which is a great size for 6-10yo kids. My cousin found it easy to fly, set up...After one or two supervised flights, i feel just fine letting him fly and take care of it on his own. It’s very fun to see him and his buddy flying it while each taking turns shooting nerf gun bullets at it and trying to control the drone dodging the bullet attack. Very pleased with the purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: N. N.

customer_reviews.title: Solid durable little drone to play around with
customer_reviews.text: I am no drone expert by a long shot but I do have a Mavic Air. I bought the A20 Mini to play around with. The best part about it is how durable it is. I let some kids play with it and it crashed multiple times and seems to have had no negative effect. It is easy to control but does seem to float in random directions without moving the controller sticks. The only real negative is that you have to pair the controller and drone every time you swap batteries which is every 5 minutes of flying time.
customer_reviews.author: Wyn

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don’t last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son after some research. My son loves it but after only a month 1 of the 2 batteries is dead and will not recharge. Also one of the remote control joysticks stick. It didn’t last very long. He’s still flying it and it’s got propeller protectors and it just lightly bounces off things if it hits something.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Great drone and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We had bought this drone for our son for Christmas 2018. 6 months later we had an issue with the motor for one of the rotors. I contacted Potensic to see if there was anything I could do to fix the problem and they ended up replacing the drone free of charge. Their customer service was very prompt in responding and they were very helpful. My 8 year old loves it and it’s perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Johnsonfammom

customer_reviews.title: works really well
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for a teen boy and he really liked it. Out of the box after charge, he was flying it around our house through all the rooms and had complete control of it. Lots better than the older ones that you had to adjust and had terrible control over. It's a fun little drone that doesn't cause any stress to fly it.
customer_reviews.author: Debi F.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for first time flyer!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic first time flyer for my 7 year olds birthday. He's been playing with it non-stop for 3 days and it still works great. We've had one fan blade bend because it got tangled in something but it comes with extras. Also comes with an extra battery so one can be charging while my son plays with the other. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DaynaM

customer_reviews.title: Fun little drone for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: The kids really enjoy this little drone. I was amazed at how fast they were able to learn how to operate it (5 & 7) . It is very simple there were a few crashes but the drone stayed in tact. Wish the flight time was a little longer but it doesn’t take long to charge. The dog hates it, he chases it lunging at it and trying to knock it out of the air. It’s entertaining for all. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Fun

customer_reviews.title: Great mini drone and easy to handle!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 6-year old as an Easter gift. The drone is very easy to fly and is quite resilient to a harsh environment that a 6-year would put it through. Battery life is somewhat minimal but adequate, given it's size.
customer_reviews.author: astevens

customer_reviews.title: So fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: So fun to play with! I bought it to play with my cats but they were both too scared of it. I figured out how to fly it super easily and if I can do it... Anyone can. My first few times I bumped into a lot and it fell in their water dish. It still worked great though, no issues. I would buy this again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old can fly!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner drone! Very well built and reliable. Our 5 year old can fly this by himself. We practice simple skills before I let him do what he likes. The batteries last between 4 and 6 minutes and are available to buy for additional consecutive flights. We fly for 15 to 60 minutes in a session. We can fly 2 to 3 at a time if we want, fun follow the leader style. Potensic builds great products that are affordable. The next step in our drone adventure will be FPV!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony M

customer_reviews.title: Very recommended for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 10 year old. His first drone. Quickly understood the mechanics and controls, flying it around the house with ease. Flying time is short but that's expected considering the small battery. Send durable and the extra parts are a plus. Taking off the props was easy for cleaning out clogs.
customer_reviews.author: SStone

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: My twin 7-year olds love these. I appreciate that they are so lightweight that they don't leave marks when they crash into the wall or knock things over. My kids have had these for two months and they are still working! The only downside is that I found them to be a little tricky to calibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Mollyreader

customer_reviews.title: A great starter drone, and fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old as a starter drone to fly indoors. The first drone worked fine for one day, but then suddenly began elevating to the ceiling before free-falling to the floor. After a couple of very quick email exchanges with the company, they replaced the drone for free (no additional shipping costs, and no need to return the first drone). Within a week, a new drone arrived and it has worked as expected. My son has really picked-up the controls and has become quite adept at navigating it around our home, up and down stairs. Highly recommended for the ease of use, customer service, battery life, and short charging time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alt

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: I own many different drones and this small Firefly A20 has been one of the most fun to fly. Indoors this is a terrific flyer. Responsive and easy to control around the house. Don't let it's small size fool you, this is a powerful little drone that is especially simple to get the hang of. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. But Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for Christmas for my brother in law and my nephew so they can play together. After 2 minutes of playing with them, they both broke down. On one of them, the on/off switch doesn't work, and the other one doesn't lift on. Pretty disappointed since I bought them both as Christmas presents. Updated review: This is my updated review, after few months customer service contacted me, and I guess my items were defective and they offer me a refund. It was disappointing but I'm really glad they contact me so great customer service! (:
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great beginning option
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got couldn’t be controlled. It just shot off into the air. Returned and got a second to replace and it is great. We have two and my 6 yos fly them in the basement all the time. Outside it needs to be a calm day or the wind easily pushes them. Great for first time flyers... I’ve thought about buying one just to fly with them. I own a DJI, but this is a cheap option to just let it go and not care.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the included batteries!
customer_reviews.text: 11 year old's review: Don't use piece of crap batteries! I learned that the hard way, and could NOT get the frequencies paired, then I changed the batteries and EVERYTHING ACTUALLY WORKS. And they put a button that does nothing, it literally says in the instructions, no function. I would give 5 stars but I gave 4 because it has a tendency to drift around in the air a little, I suggest practicing over a carpet or large mattress your first time flying (it's durable but I don't want to test how durable).
customer_reviews.author: CBB

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for boys of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son received this recently for his birthday. He loved it, but with in a few days it was no longer flying right. My husband took a video of the problem and contacted the company customer service. They decided to send out a free replacement, which was great! This is an inexpensive, mini drone, great for the price and for all ages. Husband liked it so much, he bought one for himself!
customer_reviews.author: LovestoHike

customer_reviews.title: Fun drone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone, and it ticks all the boxes: easy to learn, fun experience, almost indestructible. It's very small, and flying it outside will be a challenge unless there's no wind. And it has a nasty drift that I haven't been able to correct yet. But it does everything I was looking for in a starter drone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Kolosky

customer_reviews.title: Fun Drone for Inside our Out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old nephew while he was visiting. He is enjoying it, and we loved how quickly he learned to maneuver it around the house. With the extra battery, the fly time was adequate. The batteries are a little delicate to change, but with needle nose pliers he quickly learned to pull on the housing and not the wires to remove and install the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuystuff

customer_reviews.title: Flew into the sky and disappeared!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got for our son for christmas. The thing flew away. Literally took off and into the sky. Wasn't a windy day or anything. Om the other hand my 5yo was able to fly this thing like shed flown one before (never has) and now she wants 1 for her bday... so ordering another one but will not make the same mistake of flyimg outside and letting it take on a mind of its own and disappear into the sky again. Which my 12yo was flying it and hes really good with his drones so im pretty confident it wasnt the operator.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very very very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my five year old. He loves flying it and does very well. This drone has TAKEN A BEATING and hasn’t broke at all. It has been taken out of the air by balls, attacked by cats, fallen down flights of stairs and much more. Very easy to fly. Very accurate. Two batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It a blast!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 Year old granddaughter’ s birthday. She and her friends, some younger & some older, plus several adults all flew it with ease! Very easy to understand controls and very responsive! The safety’s it has are a plus! She and her Dad have played with it everyday for a month now and it’s still going strong and they love it!! Packed well & shipped quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Kite

customer_reviews.title: Our first drone.  Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Still the most popular Xmas gift after spending way more on other presents. Very durable too as my 4 year old has crashed the drone more times than I can count. We also tied some fishing line to it and used it to fly around this small toys, very powerful for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Nye Wang

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, it never breaks
customer_reviews.text: We got this drone as a Christmas present for my son (8) and the whole family can’t get enough. When he first opened it he was a little disappointed it was so tiny but soon as he started playing with it he could not stop and was not interested in sharing. It fell and crashed against so many things and has yet to brake. Great for beginners
customer_reviews.author: StephanieSL93

customer_reviews.title: Dog’s favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this thing. He plays with my dog, who weirdly LOVES this and lights up anytime he flies it around the house. It’s her favorite “dog toy”. It’s very entertaining watching her chase it, bark, and chomp in the air at it. The battery doesn’t last too long though and you have to fly it indoors unless there’s absolutely no wind. It’s fun for what it is!
customer_reviews.author: S. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Amusing $20 toy.
customer_reviews.text: Once you get over the fact that these are made of cheap plastic and the battery connection is a mess, these actually preform well considering. 10 minutes of run time between a 20 min charge. Good thing they come with an extra battery. They worth $20 for the amusement I guess.
customer_reviews.author: what..ever.u.say

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly fun and very easy to fly indoor drone.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly fun and easy to fly. I love the "headless mode", where it correctly goes in the desired direction regardless of the drones rotational orientation. Easy to change Max speed. One button take off and landing. Love that it comes with 2 batteries for extended fun. And overall great indoor drone. It also handles crashes well with the built it protection around the propellers. Comes with 4 extra blades just in case. And most spare parts are available for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: my first drone!  super tool, to learn how to fly
customer_reviews.text: nice tool to enter in drone hobby. I learned basic in a week pros: - very stable -avto hower - avto take off avtoland - durable, , ( it ever survived fall into a pool - quaiet cons: -to light for wind (more suitable for inside flying -hard to conecct a battery .. until you get use to it my advice: treet this like a real drone not a like a toy, and it will last long it gives a lot of fun! PS: sorry for my not so great english :) - not expensive
customer_reviews.author: Klemzy

customer_reviews.title: Great and so fun
customer_reviews.text: Super fun!! Got 2 for my kids for Christmas. They love them and have been using non stop. Easy to learn to use for 9 and 14 year olds. They are able to fly all over the house. They last pretty long before needing a recharge. Best flying toy we've had!! They handle a crash well too when still getting the hang of using
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Short lived fun
customer_reviews.text: If only the battery lasted longer than 5 minutes (5 minutes tops!). They do provide 2 batteries to switch out between but when my kids play with anything new, telling them it’s done after 10 minutes doesn’t normally end well. With that being said, they absolutely love playing with it while it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short lived functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Although this Potensic Upgraded A20 Mini Drone is so easy & so much fun to fly, one of the four, "propellers" malfunctioned shortly after I bought this Mini Drone. So now I must soon spend extra money to purchase a new Mini drone; hoping that it will last longer than the one I purchased somewhat recently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping for a GREAT mini drone!
customer_reviews.text: The Potensic A20 RC Nano Quadcopter is an amazing beginner mini drone. My experience started off with a bang! We received our Nano Quadcopter sooner than expected which completely made our 6 year old's day. Already a win! Right off the bat this quadcopter was a hit. The one key taking off and landing, in addition to the altitude hold mode, made this model easy for our young child to master flying this surprisingly fun drone in no time at all. I can't wait to post a video in the near future. Love this drone!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Great customer service! I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: brett

product_meta.title: Potensic Upgraded A20 Mini Drone Easy to Fly Drone for Kids and Beginners, RC Helicopter Quadcopter with Auto Hovering, Headless Mode, Remote Control and Extra Batteries - Green
feature_bullets: Easy to Play: With altitude hold, headless mode and One Key Taking-off / Landing, mini drone is easier to control and stabilize during flight.
Having Fun for More Time: Drone for Kids and Beginners include 2 batteries. Flight time up to 10-13 minutes.
Headless Mode: You could control the Small drone fly toward any directions by remote controller.
3 Speed: RC helicopter have three different flight speeds. You can use it in different flying environments and feel different flying experiences.
Portable and Durable: Mini drone is extremely lightweight and easy to carry. With 4 protection guards, it can protect people and make mini drone more durable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,619 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
